CustomField.description: How is the Tech Process of onboarding and integrating the customer going? Green = All is going well. Yellow = Some problems or roadblocks are going on. Red = Process is blocked and urgent help is needed!
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How is the Tech Process of Onboarding and Integrating the customer going? Green = All is going well. Yellow = Some problems or roadblocks are going on. Red = Process is blocked and urgent help is needed!
CustomField.label: Tech Status
